article_title: Unscripted: HBO’s haunting ‘Leftovers’ starts slow yet leaves you thinking
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: ERIN NEGLEY | Staff Writer

og.description: “The Leftovers” is considered a drama, yet this HBO series hangs on the question of what does it all mean, making it an existential thriller.
